newsitem.title: ITALY: Centrobanca to bid for Italfondiario.
newsitem.headline: Centrobanca to bid for Italfondiario.

text.p: Italy's Centrobanca said it is to launch a public buy offer for 27 percent of the capital of special credit institution Italfondiario at a price of 36,000 lire per share.
Centrobanca, Banca Centrale di Credito Popolare SpA, said in a statement it already holds 24.57 percent of Italfondiario SpA and after the operation will be its major shareholder.
Centrobanca said its board had also decided on a nominal 40 billion lire capital increase by the issue of one new share of a nominal 1,000 lire for every five shares at a price of 5,000 lire each.
It said the aim was to create one group operating in the medium-term credit sector.
